content:
Are the closing session slides and/or recording available somewhere?
Thank you
Here is a link to the closing session slides https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2020-05+Connectathon+24?preview=/76159578/82911525/Connectathon%20AM%20Announcements.pptx
@Sandra Vance This seems to be the kickoff session slides presented by Jim, not the closing session.

François Macary said:

Sandra Vance This seems to be the kickoff session slides presented by Jim, not the closing session.

Sorry Francois! Not sure what happened but I've updated them!
